name: data_analyzer_enhanced
description: Advanced data analysis tool demonstrating input/output parameter structure

input_parameters.name: dataset
input_parameters.description: Array of numerical data points to analyze

input_parameters.name: analysis_type
input_parameters.description: Type of analysis: basic, detailed, or statistical

output_parameters.name: data_quality_score
output_parameters.description: Quality score of the input data (0-100)

output_parameters.name: recommendations
output_parameters.description: List of recommendations based on analysis
